itunes:title: Buying Drugs From A Wendy's Drive-Thru
title: Buying Drugs From A Wendy's Drive-Thru
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary: Welcome all! This is the 4/20 edition pod that didn't go as planned, we got too high and had to stop, but finished the next day lol. We cover everything from heart transplants to Shrek getting a boner. If you listen to this episode, make sure to give us a rating and share some feedback! Thanks for listening, new episodes every Wednesday and Saturday! Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod to win the giveaway every week! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
Welcome all! This is the 4/20 edition pod that didn't go as planned, we got too high and had to stop, but finished the next day lol. We cover everything from heart transplants to Shrek getting a boner. If you listen to this episode, make sure to give us a rating and share some feedback! Thanks for listening, new episodes every Wednesday and Saturday! content:encoded:
Welcome all! This is the 4/20 edition pod that didn't go as planned, we got too high and had to stop, but finished the next day lol. We cover everything from heart transplants to Shrek getting a boner. If you listen to this episode, make sure to give us a rating and share some feedback! Thanks for listening, new episodes every Wednesday and Saturday! Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod to win the giveaway every week! --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/lightweights/support
